title: 113_hr4499
content: The "Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Enhancement Act" is the short title of the Act. It involves the submission of reports under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board. The Act amends various sections of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to include the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in the oversight of electronic surveillance. The Act amends sections of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act to include the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in oversight of electronic surveillance and physical searches. The Act amends sections of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act to include the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in oversight of electronic surveillance and physical searches by updating the relevant committees involved. The Act updates oversight of electronic surveillance and physical searches by including the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in relevant committees. The Act updates oversight of electronic surveillance and physical searches by including the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in relevant committees. Amendments are made to Section 502 regarding the oversight of the production of certain business records. The Act updates oversight of electronic surveillance and physical searches by including the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in relevant committees. Amendments are made to Section 502 regarding the oversight of the production of certain business records. The Select Committee on Intelligence of the Senate, the Committees on the Judiciary of the House of Representatives and the Senate, and the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board are involved in the amendments. The Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board is included in oversight committees for electronic surveillance and physical searches. Amendments are made to Section 502 regarding the production of certain business records. The Select Committee on Intelligence of the Senate, the Committees on the Judiciary of the House of Representatives and the Senate, and the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board are involved in the amendments. Amendments are made to include the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in oversight committees for electronic surveillance and physical searches. Changes are made to Section 502 regarding the production of certain business records. Amendments are made to include the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board in oversight committees for electronic surveillance and physical searches. Changes are made to Section 502 regarding the production of certain business records. Additionally, Section 707(a) is amended to include oversight of procedures for targeting certain persons outside the United States.
